sect4.title: apropos
sect4.para: apropos searches for keywords in a set of database files, containing short descriptions of system commands, and displays the result on the standard output.

sect4.title: makewhatis
sect4.para: makewhatis reads all the manual pages contained in given sections of manpath or the pre-formatted pages contained in the given sections of catpath. For each page, it writes a line in the whatis database. Each line consists of the name of the page and a short description, separated by a dash. The description is extracted using the content of the NAME section of the manual page.

sect4.title: man
sect4.para: man formats and displays the on-line manual pages.

sect4.title: man2dvi
sect4.para: man2dvi converts a manual page into dvi format.

sect4.title: man2html
sect4.para: man2html converts a manual page into html.

sect4.title: whatis
sect4.para: whatis searches for keywords in a set of database files, containing short descriptions of system commands, and displays the result on the standard output. Only complete word matches are displayed.
